words.source: H2406 waw + art. + n.fs chittah 'wheat'; KJV 'but the wheat', ESV 'but the wheat', NASB 'but the wheat'
H3698 waw + art. + n.fs kussemet 'spelt, emmer'; KJV 'and the rie', ESV 'and the emmer', NASB 'and the spelt'
H3808 neg. part. loʾ 'not'; KJV 'were not', ESV 'were not', NASB 'were not'
H5221 Pual perf. 3cp of נָכָה 'to strike'; KJV 'smitten', ESV 'struck down', NASB 'ruined'
H3588 conj. ki 'for, because'; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for'
H648 adj.fp ʾaphilot 'late, late-ripening'; KJV 'they were not grown up', ESV 'they are late in coming up', NASB 'they ripen late'
H2007 indep. pron. 3fp hennah 'they'; KJV 'they', ESV 'they', NASB 'they'
